g++   -g -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -Wall -Wextra -Wconversion -Wno-unused-parameter -Wold-style-cast -Woverloaded-virtual -Wpointer-arith -Wshadow -Wwrite-strings -march=native -rdynamic -O0   CMakeFiles/idleconnection_echo.dir/echo.cc.o CMakeFiles/idleconnection_echo.dir/main.cc.o  -o ../../bin/idleconnection_echo -rdynamic ../../lib/libmuduo_net.a ../../lib/libmuduo_base.a -lpthread -lrt
